Context:
George Brown College is consistently ranked as one of the Top 100 Employers in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). The college prioritizes employee wellness, diversity and inclusion, professional development opportunities, and generous benefits and pension plans. The organization values teamwork, accountability, integrity, and service commitments.
